goal.ch: 康德哲學可為西方現代哲學之轉捩點。其《純粹理性批判》不但奠定傳統形上學哲學於現代之知識論轉向，而且導致德意志觀念論之生發及其正面或負面影響的當代哲學，也因此促使西方哲學由傳統的理論形上學轉向實踐哲學為基調之進路。本課程便以純粹理性批判之知識論為主，一方面介紹康德哲學問題意識與哲學基本概念，二方面導讀該著作主要部分如導論，先驗感性論，先驗推證等及其他相關的主要文本，三方面討論其哲學之當代性，特別是其與德意志觀念論及當代詮釋學之關係，四方面實際帶領學生導讀與詮釋《純粹理性批判》之〈序言〉〈導論〉，特別是〈先驗感性論〉之文本，以使學子基本地而種全地認識這位可謂影響現代西方最普遍、最具原創性的哲學家，並且得以跨越一般經典閱讀障礙，入門精讀其最具效應歷史的哲學文本。
goal.en: “Kant’s philosophy can be seen as the turning point in modern Western philosophy. His Critique of Pure Reason not only lays the foundation of epistemological turn of traditional metaphysical philosophy, but also leads to genesis of German idealism with its positive or negative effects in contemporary Western philosophy, and therefore initiates the transformation of so called first philosophy from traditional metaphysics to the practical philosophy in Western philosophizing. This course will be based in epistemology in Critique of Pure Reason: At first it shall induce the basic problem awareness and fundamental concepts of Kant’s philosophy. Scondly it would introduce of the main parts of this work such as the “Introduction”, “the Transcendental Aesthetics” and “the Transcendental Deduction” an so an and give reading guidance of the representing texts. Thirdly it could indicate the relation between Kant’s philosophical system and German Idealism and also it contemporary meaning respecting contemporary hermeneutics. And finally it will lead the students to read and interpret the ““Preface““ and of the ““Introduction““ of ““Critique of Pure Reason““, especially the text of ““transcendental Aesthetics““. In this sense the students can learn basically and holistically about this philosophizing which influences the modern Western philosophy most generally and creatively, and they are also able to described as a basic understanding of the impact of modern Western most common, most original philosopher, and able to leap general classic dyslexia, and finnally entry into the intensive reading of philosophical texts with exellent effect history.“
